mapper.select: select case when category_level is null then 1 when cno is not null then 2 END AS big_ctg , cno, category_name, category_level from CategoryDTO;
mapper.insert: insert into ProductDTO( pno, cno, product_name, product_price, product_stock, product_description,userId) values ( #{pno}, #{cno}, #{product_name} ,#{product_price}, #{product_stock}, #{product_description},#{userId})
mapper.update: update ProductDTO set cno = #{cno}, product_name = #{product_name}, product_price = #{product_price}, product_stock = #{product_stock}, product_description = #{product_description} where pno = #{pno}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM OrderDTO orderdto INNER JOIN OrderDetailDTO detail ON orderdto.orderNum = detail.orderNum JOIN ProductDTO product ON detail.pno = product.pno JOIN PaymentDTO payment ON detail.orderDetailNum = payment.orderDetailNum WHERE product.userId = #{userId}
